author: COMSOL
description: This example determines the reflection coefficient of plane acoustic waves off a water-sediment interface at different frequencies and angles of incidence. The example uses the Acousticâ€“Poroelastic Waves Interaction multiphysics interface's ability to model coupled acoustic and elastic waves in any porous substance to describe the water-sediment system. The model results are in good agreement with those obtained in a peer-reviewed research paper.
label: reflections_water_sediment.mph
